name: Weapon Factory
description:
You are a QA Tester within the Weapon Factory. Something has gone horribly wrong with the production process, and weapons with hazardous effects have been reported. You are to test each weapon and see if it's ready to hit stores, or must be thrown away. But beware, for the weapons can have deadly reactions and could kill you!

WASD to move your character, move your MOUSE to aim your cursor. Walk over weapons to pick them up, Left click to shoot them. Deposit the good weapons in the good bin (green one), and deposit bad weapons in the trash (trash can). Deposit all the weapons to complete the game.

Developed by Bojian Liu, Leo L., Brendan Dolata and Scott Summers.

Developed using the Unity Engine, with only outside source being the shark sprite, which is found here: http://www.clipartpanda.com/categories/cute-shark-clip-art.
